properties.description: Tayseer Finance is a Saudi Arabian private financial services firm with 212 employees and 41.9% YoY growth since 2011; it offers personal, SME, vehicle, and fleet financing. The company secured SAR 3 billion in government-backed funding and a SAR 400 million credit line in 2025, operating under Saudi Central Bank regulation.
